alert.note: Alert for Kenosha; Racine; Walworth (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 15 at 10:49PM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Walworth, central Racine and Kenosha Counties through 1130 PM CDT... At 1049 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Twin Lakes, or near Fox Lake, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Kenosha, Racine, Mount Pleasant, Pleasant Prairie, Antioch, Lake Geneva, Sturtevant, Union Grove, Paddock Lake, Camp Lake, Winthrop Harbor, Twin Lakes, Wheatland, Yorkville, Genoa City, Silver Lake, Wind Point, Lake Catherine, Powers Lake and Browns Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for southeastern Wisconsin.
